bibl.title: Despatch from L de R du Verge
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.p: have made the bay their Head quarters on by return south my health was not improved at all, and the Doctors ordered me to leave at once for the U.S. and gave me a certificate to that effect which I forward in another despatch. I left Loanda for my Northern Jurisdiction about a month ago, Ambriz is worst than Loanda, but from Kinsembo to Banana Congo, the coast which is still under the rule, is covered with foreign trading houses.

At Banana Am: Whalers are seen almost daily during the Whaling season and Anchor there for water & provisions. I have forwarded in another despatch my report on the Congo. While in Banana and waiting on a sick bed for the mail steamer to Loanda. The U.S.S. Quinnebang Comdr Michael Ludlow, landed and took me on board and brought me here

I have the honor to be
Sir
Your obedient servant
L de R du Verge
US Consul
